title: US intensifies criticism of Pak ballistic missile programme
content: The United States reaffirms its long-standing opposition to supporting Pakistan's ballistic missile program, emphasizing continued enforcement of sanctions for national security. Recent US sanctions targeted a Chinese research institute and companies for allegedly supplying missile-related items to Pakistan. In response, Pakistan criticized the actions as biased and politically motivated.
summary: The United States reaffirms its long-standing opposition to supporting Pakistan's ballistic missile program, emphasizing continued enforcement of sanctions for national security. Recent US sanctions targeted a Chinese research institute and companies for allegedly supplying missile-related items to Pakistan. In response, Pakistan criticized the actions as biased and politically motivated.

title: Kimberly Guilfoyle now shares a kissing photo with Donald Trump Jr amid Bettina Anderson row
content: ​"I would love to see you in the White House Kimberly. The Trump family will never find another loyal and dedicated individual as yourself...." a follower wrote to Kimberly's Instagram post in which she was seen with Donald Trump Jr at an event during the weekends. The photos come amid speculations of tension in their relationship because pf Don Jr's apparent proximity with Bettina Anderson.
summary: ​"I would love to see you in the White House Kimberly. The Trump family will never find another loyal and dedicated individual as yourself...." a follower wrote to Kimberly's Instagram post in which she was seen with Donald Trump Jr at an event during the weekends. The photos come amid speculations of tension in their relationship because pf Don Jr's apparent proximity with Bettina Anderson.

title: Tesla, SpaceX, X employees donate more to Kamala Harris, despite Musk's support for Trump
content: Elon Musk endorses Donald Trump for the upcoming US presidential election, contrasting with his employees at Tesla, SpaceX, and X who support Kamala Harris. OpenSecrets data reveals significant donations from employees to Harris's campaign. Previously a supporter of Joe Biden in 2020, Musk has now shifted his political stance to the right.
summary: Elon Musk endorses Donald Trump for the upcoming US presidential election, contrasting with his employees at Tesla, SpaceX, and X who support Kamala Harris. OpenSecrets data reveals significant donations from employees to Harris's campaign. Previously a supporter of Joe Biden in 2020, Musk has now shifted his political stance to the right.

title: After pagers, walkie-talkies blasts, Israel says 'many capabilities yet to be activated'
At least two killed in gas field explosion in Uzbekistan
content: An explosion at an under-construction gas field in Uzbekistan killed at least two people and injured others. Occurring near Baysun, this follows a previous incident releasing hydrogen sulphide gas. Authorities closed schools and evacuated workers. Discovered during the Soviet era, the gas field is now being developed with foreign investment.
summary: An explosion at an under-construction gas field in Uzbekistan killed at least two people and injured others. Occurring near Baysun, this follows a previous incident releasing hydrogen sulphide gas. Authorities closed schools and evacuated workers. Discovered during the Soviet era, the gas field is now being developed with foreign investment.

title: Does Barron Trump really have 4 crypto wallets? Why it matters
content: ​“Barron knows so much about this, Barron’s a young guy, but he knows. He talks about his wallet, he’s got four wallets or something, and I’ll say ‘what is a wallet?’” Donald Trump said at the launch of the World Liberty Financial -- the crypto project of the Trumps. 18-year-old Barron is the DeFi visionary of this project and as claimed by his father, Barron has exceptional understanding about crypto.
summary: ​“Barron knows so much about this, Barron’s a young guy, but he knows. title: MAGA mom mocks Kamala for not having biological children
Explosives found near Donald Trump's rally site at Long Island? Cops say 'no threat'
content: After two assassination attempts on former president Donald Trump, explosives were reportedly found in a car near the site where Donald Trump is scheduled to address a rally at Long Island. Nassau County Police department confirmed that there was a suspicious occurrence on Wednesday ahead of Trump's address but there was no threat to the Republican presidential candidate.
summary: After two assassination attempts on former president Donald Trump, explosives were reportedly found in a car near the site where Donald Trump is scheduled to address a rally at Long Island. Nassau County Police department confirmed that there was a suspicious occurrence on Wednesday ahead of Trump's address but there was no threat to the Republican presidential candidate.

title: Melania Trump says she's proud of her nude modeling work: 'Are we no longer...?'
content: Melania Trump said more that her nude modeling works the media scrutiny on her past profession is a graver concern. In a teaser video of her upcoming memoir, she addressed the concern that became a bothering question during the 2016 election campaign -- to-be first lady's nude shoots. As Trump runs for reelection and his fashion model wife emerges as a writer, Melania answers the question.
summary: Melania Trump said more that her nude modeling works the media scrutiny on her past profession is a graver concern. title: Trump claims 'fantastic' Modi is coming to US to meet him
content: Donald Trump claimed that Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit the US to meet him next week. PM Modi's official schedule includes attending the Quad summit hosted by President Biden and other events in New York City, but no meeting with Trump is listed. The Indian Embassy and State Department have not commented on Trump's claim.
summary: Donald Trump claimed that Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit the US to meet him next week. PM Modi's official schedule includes attending the Quad summit hosted by President Biden and other events in New York City, but no meeting with Trump is listed. The Indian Embassy and State Department have not commented on Trump's claim.

title: What is a walkie-talkie? Device linked to round 2 of fatal explosions in Lebanon
content: On Wednesday, explosions linked to walkie-talkies used by Hezbollah struck Lebanon's southern regions and Beirut's suburbs, causing numerous casualties and injuries. Thousands of explosive-rigged pagers detonated simultaneously. In response, Hezbollah launched rocket strikes on Israeli artillery positions, escalating tensions in the region.
summary: On Wednesday, explosions linked to walkie-talkies used by Hezbollah struck Lebanon's southern regions and Beirut's suburbs, causing numerous casualties and injuries. Thousands of explosive-rigged pagers detonated simultaneously. In response, Hezbollah launched rocket strikes on Israeli artillery positions, escalating tensions in the region.

title: Donald Trump, Melania's photo with little Tiffany Trump viral. Reason is...
content: The Trump campaign shared an old family photo featuring Donald, Melania, and Tiffany Trump to showcase their familial side. Tiffany Trump, daughter from Donald's marriage to Marla Maples, usually stays out of the spotlight but supports her father's campaigns. Donald Trump Jr, Eric Trump, Barron Trump are part of the Trump campaign while Ivanka Trump was his advisor in the previous stint.
summary: The Trump campaign shared an old family photo featuring Donald, Melania, and Tiffany Trump to showcase their familial side. Tiffany Trump, daughter from Donald's marriage to Marla Maples, usually stays out of the spotlight but supports her father's campaigns. Donald Trump Jr, Eric Trump, Barron Trump are part of the Trump campaign while Ivanka Trump was his advisor in the previous stint.

title: Japan: 'Jealous' husband arrested after making over 100 nuisance calls every day for a month
content: A Japanese man harassed his wife with 100 silent calls daily for a month due to jealousy. The woman from Hyogo prefecture reported it to the police after suspecting her husband's involvement. Police confirmed he was behind the calls, leading to his arrest. This incident has sparked discussions on relationship communication and controlling behavior.
summary: A Japanese man harassed his wife with 100 silent calls daily for a month due to jealousy. The woman from Hyogo prefecture reported it to the police after suspecting her husband's involvement. Police confirmed he was behind the calls, leading to his arrest. This incident has sparked discussions on relationship communication and controlling behavior.

title: Trump megadonor, billionaire says he would pull his money from market if Harris wins
content: John Paulson, a major Trump fundraiser and hedge fund billionaire, said he would withdraw his investments if Kamala Harris wins the presidential election. He cites concerns over her proposed economic policies, including higher taxes on corporate profits and unrealized gains. ​“I’d go into cash and I’d go into gold because I think the uncertainty regarding the plans they outlined would create a lot of uncertainty in the markets and likely lower markets," John Paulson said.
summary: John Paulson, a major Trump fundraiser and hedge fund billionaire, said he would withdraw his investments if Kamala Harris wins the presidential election. He cites concerns over her proposed economic policies, including higher taxes on corporate profits and unrealized gains. ​“I’d go into cash and I’d go into gold because I think the uncertainty regarding the plans they outlined would create a lot of uncertainty in the markets and likely lower markets," John Paulson said.

title: Gavin Newsom targets AI deepfakes with new law: Why Elon Musk and others think it's a really bad idea
content: California Governor Gavin Newsom signed bills banning political deepfakes and misleading AI-generated content. The laws mandate disclosures in political ads, require online platforms to remove deceptive content within 72 hours, and penalize creators of false information about candidates. These measures will help to combat the harmful use of deepfakes in political ads and other content.
summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom signed bills banning political deepfakes and misleading AI-generated content. The laws mandate disclosures in political ads, require online platforms to remove deceptive content within 72 hours, and penalize creators of false information about candidates. These measures will help to combat the harmful use of deepfakes in political ads and other content.

title: Pakistan high court halts verdict in Imran Khan, Bushra Bibi corruption case
content: The Islamabad High Court has restrained a trial court from issuing its verdict in the Al-Qadir Trust corruption case involving former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi. They petitioned for acquittal, citing recent amendments in anti-corruption laws that they argue invalidate the charges. The trial remains ongoing with notices issued to involved parties.
summary: The Islamabad High Court has restrained a trial court from issuing its verdict in the Al-Qadir Trust corruption case involving former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi. They petitioned for acquittal, citing recent amendments in anti-corruption laws that they argue invalidate the charges. The trial remains ongoing with notices issued to involved parties.

title: Kamala Harris-hater Laura Loomer says she's not loyal to Republican Party
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer said she is not loyal to either of the political parties -- the Republican and the Democratic Party. Her loyalty lies only to former president Donald Trump and many Republicans have a problem with that, she said. GOP presidential candidate Donald Trump, VP candidate JD Vance did not endorse Laura Loomer's curry comment but also emphasized that she is not part of Trump campaign.
summary: Far-right activist Laura Loomer said she is not loyal to either of the political parties -- the Republican and the Democratic Party. Her loyalty lies only to former president Donald Trump and many Republicans have a problem with that, she said.  GOP presidential candidate Donald Trump, VP candidate JD Vance did not endorse Laura Loomer's curry comment but also emphasized that she is not part of Trump campaign.

title: Train cancelled in Britain after squirrel refuses to disembark
content: A British train was cancelled after two squirrels boarded and one refused to disembark. The incident disrupted the 08:54 Reading to Gatwick Airport service, forcing it to terminate early at Redhill. Despite staff efforts, one squirrel remained on board, resulting in the service's premature end.
summary: A British train was cancelled after two squirrels boarded and one refused to disembark. The incident disrupted the 08:54 Reading to Gatwick Airport service, forcing it to terminate early at Redhill. Despite staff efforts, one squirrel remained on board, resulting in the service's premature end.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy explains who's to blame for 'Haitian immigrants eating cats' row
content: Vivek Ramaswamy said neither the residents of Springfield nor the immigrants should be blamed for the situation in Springfield. The community in Springfield was not prepared to handle the pressure of the immigrants who have been allowed to settle there by 'awful federal policies', Vivek said as Ohio's Springfield continues to seethe amid rumors of 'eating cats' and several bomb threats.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy said neither the residents of Springfield nor the immigrants should be blamed for the situation in Springfield. The community in Springfield was not prepared to handle the pressure of the immigrants who have been allowed to settle there by 'awful federal policies', Vivek said as Ohio's Springfield continues to seethe amid rumors of 'eating cats' and several bomb threats.

title: 3 grams explosives in 5,000 pagers: How Israel carried out covert strike on Hezbollah
content: Explosives embedded in over 5000 pagers by Mossad triggered simultaneous explosions across Lebanon, causing over 11 deaths and injuring more than 3000 people. Hezbollah blamed Israel for the attack and vowed retaliation. Taiwanese company Gold Apollo denied involvement, stating they only authorized the brand and had no part in designing or manufacturing the pagers.
summary: Explosives embedded in over 5000 pagers by Mossad triggered simultaneous explosions across Lebanon, causing over 11 deaths and injuring more than 3000 people. Hezbollah blamed Israel for the attack and vowed retaliation. Taiwanese company Gold Apollo denied involvement, stating they only authorized the brand and had no part in designing or manufacturing the pagers.
